Ah-ah
Ah-ah-ah

[Verse 1]
'83 Caddy with the big-square body and the wheels got tucked in
Chewin' on a cigarette, lookin' at me funny, "What the fuck you smokin'?"

Walk into the party, and my neck is on Bugatti, whole bitch got frozen

(Hah-hah, hah-hah) And you know how it goes, ain't it sweet?
(Hah-hah, hah-hah) Texas tea (Hah-hah, hah-hah), uh, mm

[Verse 2]

Record companies really tryna clone me
Got these motherfuckers singin' karaoke
No one's Ginuwine, but they gon' ride my pony
Show the titties off, everybody notice me
Yeah, I'm very pretty, everybody wanna see
And I'm pretty used to everybody oglin'
Now I got that bitch yodelin' in bed, I do

21 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsGreen Thumb Lyrics[Intro]
Da-da, dum-dum

[Verse 1]
Drove by your house and noticed it was overgrown
Your flowers are all dead and I thought you should know
What happened to your green thumb that you were so proud of?
Their bodies were scattered and starving for love
Starving for love

[Chorus]
One, one, one was on his deathbed
He told me you left long ago
Oh, no, he said with his last breath
"Wake up, she's not comin' home"

[Bridge]
Da-da, dum-dum

[Verse 2]
He must be so cool and own a motorcycle
Buy you new flowers to replace what you left
My new love pours herself out more than I'd like
Her name is Brandy, we'll be married tonight
Married tonight

When I, I, I, I'm on my deathbed
I'll remember you left long ago
Oh, no, I hear the nurse say
"Goodnight, she's never comin' home"3Embed
